channel.title: Upcycled Sweater on Morja
channel.description: Recent content in Upcycled Sweater on Morja

item.title: Å PELA
item.description: Very often, when coming amid unknown people and learning someone is from the same area where I live, I feel connected to them by this fact, and I trust them slightly more than the others. And so happened when starting my part-time student job.
